title: House for Rent in North Austin w Large Yard - Pets Welcome!
posting_body: 4 bed, 2 full bath house with attached two car garage.
Lovely, friendly neighborhood.
We have a huge fenced backyard with a covered patio, a sun patio, a fire pit area, and plenty of grassy open space for dogs and kids to play!
Kitchen equipped with gas range, dishwasher, and refrigerator.
Large, open-concept kitchen/dining/living area with high vaulted ceilings is perfect for entertaining.
Huge primary bedroom (very comfortably fits a California king bed) has a walk-in closet off the bathroom.
Other 3 bedrooms have large wall-to-wall closets.
Washer/dryer included in laundry room.
Central air and heating operated by a Nest smart thermostat.
Whole house has laminate, wood-style flooring (no carpet).
Lawn maintenance included in lease 2x/month.
Minutes from The Domain, Q2 Stadium, HEB, Whole Foods, and lots of fun breweries in North Austin.
Close to companies like Apple, Samsung, Indeed, etc.
Looking for an Oct. 1st start date but are very flexible to an earlier or later date for the right tenants.
Also flexible on lease duration.
Looking for at least 9 months but 6 months is the minimum.
But always happy to chat about what might work for you.
Renter's insurance required.
Background and credit checks required.
First month’s rent and refundable deposit of $3300 required upfront at lease signing.
All pets welcome for an additional $500 refundable deposit.
Tenant pays all utilities and internet.
